VoidUI_assault_2: Haha, your payday is haunted, haha
VoidUI_assault_5: How long is this ticker anyway?
VoidUI_assault_6: That's the alarm guys, it's on now
VoidUI_assault_7: Payday 2 Won't have Microtransactions (Shame on you if you thought otherwise!)
VoidUI_assault_8: Someone tell command we are not prepared for this kind of engagement
VoidUI_assault_9: Guys, the thermal drill. Go get it
VoidUI_assault_10: Fuck me, we needed those damn cooks
VoidUI_assault_11: I hope you're using silencer skills
VoidUI_assault_13: The Dark Souls of heist games
VoidUI_assault_14: Do not try this in real life
VoidUI_assault_15: If you see this, post it on Reddit
VoidUI_assault_16: You cheated by using invalid weapon or weapon mod
VoidUI_assault_17: Local streamer becomes funny easter egg line
VoidUI_assault_21: You have been kicked from the game
VoidUI_assault_22: The secret assault message is cosmetic
VoidUI_assault_23: Do they not have coloured printers in Russia?
VoidUI_assault_24: Thermal Drill: The PAYDAY 2 Card Game
VoidUI_options_desc: Customize the behavior of Void UI
VoidUI_hud_scale_desc: Set the scale of all Void UI elements. Elements can also be resized separately
VoidUI_outlines_desc: Make the outline of converted cops the same color as their owner
VoidUI_assault_lines_desc:
Add back bain responses warning of the next imminent assault. 
Light: 30 second warning. Standard: 30, 20, and 10 second warning, like PDTH.
VoidUI_reset_desc: Reset every option to their default configuration
VoidUI_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset Void UI to the default configuration? This can not be undone.
VoidUI_warning_desc: Some of your changes may not take effect until the next heist
VoidUI_hudteammate_desc: Options related to the main player and teammates panels
VoidUI_teammate_panels_decs: Enable the Void UI player and teammate panels
VoidUI_main_scale_desc: Set the scale of the player hud panel element
VoidUI_main_health_desc:
Set how your health value is shown. 
Percentage: The percentage of your current/total health, Real Value: The actual amount of health you have
VoidUI_main_anim_time_desc: Set how quickly health transforms on healing/taking damage in seconds
VoidUI_armor_desc:
Set how your armor value is shown. 
Percentage: The percentage of your current/total armor, Real Value: The actual amount of armor you have
VoidUI_total_decs: Show the amount of ammo you have in reserve instead of your total ammo
VoidUI_main_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs you have left before you go to custody (loud only)
VoidUI_main_stealth_desc: Show the amount of body bags you have left (stealth only)
VoidUI_ammo_pickup_desc: Show the amount of ammo you've picked up
VoidUI_mate_scale_desc: Set the scale of the teammate hud elements
VoidUI_mate_health_desc:
Set how your teammates' health values are shown. 
Percentage: The percentage of their current/total health, Real Value: The actual amount of health they have
VoidUI_mate_anim_time_desc: Set how quickly health transforms on teammates healing/taking damage in seconds
VoidUI_mate_armor_desc:
Set how your teammates' armor values are shown. 
Percentage: The percentage of their current/total armor, Real Value: The actual amount of armor they have
VoidUI_mate_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs your teammates' have left before they go to custody (loud only)
VoidUI_mate_stealth_desc: Show your teammates' detection risk in their respective health bars (stealth only)
VoidUI_mate_name_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level before their name
VoidUI_mate_interact_desc: Show the remaining time for your teammates' interactions
VoidUI_objectives_desc: Options related to the timer panel and the objectives panel
VoidUI_objectives_scale_desc: Set the scale of both the timer and the objectives elements
VoidUI_objectives_show_timer_desc:
Show the timer panel 
Hide: Never show, On Tabscreen: Only show while the tabscreen is open Show: Always show
VoidUI_enable_timer_desc: Enable the Void UI timer panel
VoidUI_levelname_desc: Show the name of the current day of the heist
VoidUI_ghost_desc: Show a ghost icon on stealthable levels. Turns red if stealth is failed
VoidUI_loot_desc: Show the amount of loot you have secured during the heist
VoidUI_enable_objectives_desc: Enable the Void UI objectives panel
VoidUI_objective_history_desc: Set the maximum amount of past objectives that can appear on the hud
VoidUI_objectives_show_desc:
Show the objectives panel 
Hide: Never show, On Tabscreen: Only show while the tabscreen is open Show: Always show
VoidUI_assault_desc: Options related to the assault panel
VoidUI_enable_assault_decs: Enable the Void UI Assault panel
VoidUI_assault_scale_desc: Set the scale the assault panel element
VoidUI_badge_desc: Show the police badge during assaults
VoidUI_badge_anim_desc: Animate the police badge with a fancy 'pulse' effect
VoidUI_hostages_desc: Show civilian and police hostages in seprate panels (loud only)
VoidUI_pagers_desc: Show the amount of pagers you have left (stealth only)
VoidUI_jammer_desc: Show the battery life of activated ecm jammers (stealth only)
VoidUI_chat_desc: Options related to the player chat
VoidUI_enable_chat_decs: Enable the Void UI Player Chat
VoidUI_chat_scale_desc: Set the scale of the player chat
VoidUI_chat_mouse_desc: Unlock the mouse when using chat. With mouse unlocked you can scroll easier and copy messages
VoidUI_charactername_desc: Show what heister the message's sender is playing as
VoidUI_chattime_desc:
Show the time messages were sent at. 
GAME TIME is the time since the start of the current heist day, SYSTEM TIME is the time in your PC
VoidUI_chat_copy_desc: Enable copying chat messages to the clipboard by right clicking on them, and set what to copy
VoidUI_label_desc: Options related to the floating labels and waypoints
VoidUI_enable_labels_desc: Enable the Void UI name labels
VoidUI_jokernames_desc: Add name labels for converted cops
VoidUI_jokerhealth_desc: Show the health of converted cops on their name label
VoidUI_label_scale_desc: Set the scale of the name labels
VoidUI_label_minscale_desc: Set the scale of the name labels in minimal mode
VoidUI_minlabel_desc: Name labels will become smaller when their owner is far away from you or you're not looking at them
VoidUI_minrank_title: Show rank and level in minmode
VoidUI_minrank_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level when theit label is in minimal mode
VoidUI_mindist_desc: Set the distance away from you in meters after which the name labels should enter minimal mode
VoidUI_mindot_desc: Set how direct you need to point your screen at another player to temporarily disable minmode on their label
VoidUI_waypoint_scale_desc: Set the scale of the objective waypoints and awareness markers
VoidUI_waypoint_radius_desc: Set how far offscreen waypoints are from the center of your screen when their source is out of view
VoidUI_waypoint_offscreen_desc: Show waypoints when their source is out of view
VoidUI_interact_desc: Options related to the interaction panel and the stealth detection panel
VoidUI_enable_interact_desc: Enable the Void UI interaction panel
VoidUI_interact_scale_desc: Set the scale of the interaction panel
VoidUI_interact_y_desc: Set the vertical position of the interaction panel from the middle of the screen
VoidUI_interacttime_desc: Show the remaining time from your interaction
VoidUI_enable_suspicion_desc: Enable the Void UI detection panel
VoidUI_suspicion_y_desc: Set the vertical position of the detection panel from the middle of the screen
VoidUI_suspicion_scale_desc: Set the scale of the detection panel
VoidUI_stats_desc: Options related to the TAB stat screen
VoidUI_enable_stats_desc: Enable the Void UI Stat Screen
VoidUI_scoreboard_scale_desc: Set the scale of the stat panel
VoidUI_blur_desc: Blur the background when the stat panel is open
VoidUI_scoreboard_maxlevel_desc: Show the experience bar when you are at the maximum level
VoidUI_scoreboard_desc: Add a scoreboard to the stat screen where you can see statistics about you and your teammates
VoidUI_scoreboard_character_desc: Show the mask of the heister a player is playing as
VoidUI_scoreboard_skills_desc: Show the number of skillpoints a player has spent in each skilltree
VoidUI_scoreboard_kills_desc: Show the amount of law enforcers a player has killed
VoidUI_scoreboard_specials_desc: Show the amount of special units a player has killed
VoidUI_scoreboard_civs_desc: Show the amount of civilians a player has killed
VoidUI_scoreboard_downs_desc: Show the amount of times a player has been downed
VoidUI_scoreboard_weapons_desc: Show a player's equiped primary, secondary (mask for bots), and melee weapons
VoidUI_scoreboard_skins_desc: Show skins applied to players' weapons
VoidUI_scoreboard_perk_desc: Show the equiped perk deck (crew ability for bots) of the player
VoidUI_scoreboard_playtime_desc: Show the amount of hours the player has (crew boost for bots)
VoidUI_scoreboard_ping_desc: Show a player's latency to you
VoidUI_ping_frequency_desc: Set how often should ping values update in seconds
VoidUI_scoreboard_toggle_desc: Set the button that toggles between the scoreboard and tracked achievements
VoidUI_presenter_desc: Options related to hud notifications and hints
VoidUI_presenter_scale_desc: Set the scale of the notification panels
VoidUI_presenter_buffer_desc: Set the maximum amount of notifications visible at the same time
VoidUI_presenter_sound_desc: Disable playing sound effects when hints and notifications appear
VoidUI_enable_hint_desc: Enable the Void UI hint panel
VoidUI_hint_scale_desc: Set the scale of the hint text
VoidUI_hint_anim_desc: Animate hints with a fancy 'jump out' effect
VoidUI_vape_hints_desc: Display a hint notification when tagging somebody/being tagged by the Tag Team perk-deck. Also adds a few seconds long outline
VoidUI_enable_challanges_desc: Enable the Void UI challange notifications
VoidUI_hint_challanges_desc: Set the scale of the challange notification panels
VoidUI_subtitles_bg_desc: Set what kind of background subtitles have
VoidUI_blackscreen_desc: Options related to the heist intro (blackscreen) and loading screens
VoidUI_enable_blackscreen_desc: Enable the Void UI heist intro (blackscreen)
VoidUI_blackscreen_map_desc: Show the current day of the heist
VoidUI_blackscreen_risk_desc: Show the name of the difficulty you're playing on
VoidUI_blackscreen_skull_desc: Show skull icons based on the difficulty you're playing on
VoidUI_blackscreen_linger_desc: Fade from the heist intro to your game
VoidUI_blackscreen_time_desc: Determine how long you have to hold the skip button for
VoidUI_enable_loadingscreen_desc: Enable the Void UI loading screens
VoidUI_loading_heistinfo_desc: Show information about the heist like its name, contractor, difficulty
VoidUI_loading_players_desc: Show the name of the players you are connected with
VoidUI_loading_briefing_desc: Show the contractor's briefing for the heist
